name: Right Jump (Android)
description:
You are low on the ground, but platforms help you get up!

But watch out: The platforms are dangerous and if they hit you in the wrong way they will kill you! You will need excellent timing to make it to the top!

Small Game to waste some Time on. 

----UPDATE LOG----
